description: Try our easy to follow Best-Ever Ham & Cheese Toastie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Best-Ever Ham & Cheese Toastie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slice leg ham off the bone

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, mix reserved tomato pesto with mayonnaise. Cut toasties in half and serve with pesto mayonnaise on the side.
